questions.question_text_1: Which of the following approaches to integration testing does not require extra software components, known as scaffolding?

questions.question_text_1: Consider a CFG with a single component that has 6 nodes and 9 edges. What is the cyclomatic complexity of the given CFG? Do not write the number in words, if your answer is 6, enter 6 but not six.
